message.entry: The input image must be [H W] type for peopleDetector.
The NormalizationStatistics structure must contain the following fields: Mean and StandardDeviation.
peopleDetector requires the Computer Vision Toolbox Model for RTMDet Object Detection support package. To install this support package, use the Add-On Explorer.
The 'Mean' and 'StandardDeviation' field values of the NormalizationStatistics structure must be a vector of size [1 {0}].
A peopleDetector object cannot be an output of an extrinsic function or entry-point function.
